attributes.action: Cease anonymity for the Jamie Bulger murderers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Lady Justice Butler-Sloss has awarded the two boys (now men ), who disgustingly took Jamie Bulgers life, anonymity for the rest of their lives when they leave custody with new identities. They disgustingly and violently took Jamie's life away and in return they each get a new life! 

Please.... . If you feel as strongly as we do, that this is agrave Miscarriage of justice, please sign this petition andtell others to do the same

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Cease anonymity for the Jamie Bulger murderers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18916


Prime Minister's Office
